greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fixed points when A001414 is iterated and started at factorials of prime numbers.
mathematica: sopfr[n_] := Total[Times @@@ FactorInteger[n]]; a[n_] := FixedPoint[sopfr, Prime[n]!]; Array[a, 100] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 06 2017 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 08 2003
